attributes.action: Call a general election when he steps down as PM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Polls show that a significant number of the elctorate do not want Gordon Brown as PM. When Tony Blair steps down. A general election should be held after the new leader has been elected by the Labour Party.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
